name: pr-landmine
description: A simple, language agnostic solution for creating manual mutation tests directly in-line with an Azure DevOps pull request
author: Tyler Murry

inputs.name: accessToken
inputs.label: The access token used to retrieve and update comments on the pull requests

inputs.name: testCommand
inputs.label: The command that is executed after each landmine is added. Ideally, this includes other static validation such as linting.

inputs.name: testCommandDirectory
inputs.label: The directory to apply the test command. Useful if your tests are orchestrated in a different directory than root.

inputs.name: testCommandTimeout
inputs.label: The number of milliseconds to wait before bailing on the test command. Needs to be sufficiently high to run the test suite but low enough to catch infinite loops or runaway threads created by the mutation.

inputs.name: autoResolve
inputs.label: If the bomb is defused successfully, the original pull request comment will be auto-resolved.
